recipeList.directions: 1. Heat a toaster or frying pan over medium heat.  2. Cut a loaf of bread of your choice into two equal slices.  3. Drizzle the butter onto both sides of one of the slices of bread.  4. Place the slice of bread in the heated toaster or pan.  5. Toast the slice of bread until it is lightly browned.  6. Remove the toast from heat and place your you onto the slice of toast.  7. Toast the second slice of bread until lightly browned.  8. Place the slice with you on top of the toast slice.  9. Slice the sandwich in half and serve.
recipeList.ingredients: You (1 slice), Bread (2 slices), Butter (1 teaspoon)

recipeList.directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. 2. Place you in a baking dish. 3. Sprinkle cheese over you. 4. Drizzle olive oil over cheese. 5. Bake for about 20 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
recipeList.ingredients: you (1), cheddar cheese (2 cups), olive oil (2 tablespoons)
